DOC.brief_summary: This study do evaluate schedule use intravenous ( IV ) acetaminophen among cesarean section patient . The study hop find patient receive schedule IV acetaminophen 48 hour follow delivery low self-reported pain score use less narcotic pain medication patient receive IV acetaminophen .
DOC.brief_title: RCT ( Randomized Controlled Trial ) IV Acetaminophen Post Cesarean Pain Relief
DOC.criteria: Age great equal 18 year Scheduled cesarean section delivery Patient TriHealth 's Faculty Medical Center TriState Maternal Fetal Medicine Associates Singleton pregnancy Term delivery ( great equal 37 week ) Spinal/epidural anesthesia epidural analgesia ( duramorph ) Use pfannenstiel incision Weight le 50 kg Allergy study drug ( acetaminophen , oxycodone , duramorph , NSAIDS ) Multiple gestation pregnancy Cesarean section preterm delivery ( le 37 week ) Fetal anomaly Inability use epidural duramorph time procedure General anesthesia use Vertical skin incision Opioid addiction Liver dysfunction ( hepatitis , HELLP ( hemolysis , elevate liver enzyme , low platelet count ) , preeclampsia )
